duties_responsibilities.duty: Support different senior family members and the family office with seamless administrative coverage and support
Understand family members' needs, working styles, and preferences, acting as the gatekeeper in complex and high-stress situations
Manage complex and dynamic calendars, liaise with external parties, and coordinate among all schedules and calendars proactively
Be responsible for follow-up items and assisting with personal tasks such as travel arrangements and contact management

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
